hadiths.text: Narrated AbuMusa: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If a woman uses perfume and passes the people so that they may get its odour, she is so-and-so, meaning severe remarks

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَرْأَةِ تَتَطَيَّبُ لِلْخُرُوجِ
chapter.eng-name: Women Wearing Perfume When Going Out
